name: cms-analyzers-marketplace
description: Claude Code plugins for analyzing enterprise CMS platforms with actionable reports

plugins.name: sitecore-classic
plugins.description: Sitecore 10.x analyzer for Helix compliance, serialization, and C# patterns

plugins.name: xm-cloud
plugins.description: XM Cloud analyzer for JSS, Next.js, GraphQL, and headless patterns

plugins.name: umbraco
plugins.description: Umbraco 14-16 analyzer for backoffice, Content Delivery API, and architecture

plugins.name: optimizely
plugins.description: Optimizely CMS/Content Cloud analyzer for content modeling, .NET patterns, and headless APIs

plugins.name: optimizely-exp
plugins.description: Optimizely Experimentation analyzer for A/B testing, feature flags, and JavaScript SDK patterns
